alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 6:58PM MST until January 07 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Areas along and downslope...north and east...of the Mogollon Rim, White Mountains, and Kaibab Plateau. * WHEN...From 9 PM Saturday to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could snap resulting in a few power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Secure loose outdoor objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, such as RVs, campers, and tractor trailers. Use extra caution.
